message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than it is to me. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1,150,000.  What are your thoughts?
Alice, thanks for the offer. I agree this product would be valuable for me, but $1,150,000 is a bit steep.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,075,000?
Bob, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still looking for a bit more than that. How about $1,110,000?  It's a fantastic deal for a product you know will be a huge benefit.

Alice, I'm seeing your willingness to negotiate, but $1,110,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'd be willing to go to $1,090,000. That's a fair offer considering its value and our respective positions.
